item.title: How to use GitHub
item.description: GitHub is a version control, file hosting service. How to set up GitHub on your computer Create an account at https://github.

item.title: How to use Obsidian
item.description: Why should you use obsidian? Obsidian is a dedicated editor for markdown files (format in which the hive was is written).

item.title: Push and Pull
item.description: What is pushing and pulling? Pushing content is basically uploading changes onto GitHub Pulling content is downloading changes made from GitHub
